message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm very interested in the product, but $850000 seems a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $850000 and $700000. I'll sell the product to you for $775000. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value and rarity.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $775000 to $700000, so I'm thinking $737500. Can you consider this offer?
